it.polimi.se2019.server.controller

Class ShotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.controller.ShotController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ShotController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    ShotController class aim is to scan each weapon of a player to verify which of the weapon a player can use to shoot others player.
    Author:
    merklind, mattiamassarini
    See Also:

      The method call in sequence checkIsLoad, checkCubes, checkVisibility and purgeUselessWeapons the verify which weapon a player can use

      Scan all the weapons of the current player to verify which effect of all weapons the players could pay.

      checkIsLoad scan all the weapons a player has in his hand and verify if the weapon is load or not.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> checkVisibility(Player currentPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> checkedWeapon)
      Scan all the effects of all weapons and check for each effect if there is at least one target the player could attack related to the typeVisibility of that effect.

      • checkAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> checkAll(Player currentPlayer)
        The method call in sequence checkIsLoad, checkCubes, checkVisibility and purgeUselessWeapons the verify which weapon a player can use
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer: - the current player
        Returns:

      • checkIsLoad

        private java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> checkIsLoad(Player currentPlayer)
        checkIsLoad scan all the weapons a player has in his hand and verify if the weapon is load or not.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer: - the current player
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of only loaded weapon

      • checkCubes

        private java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> checkCubes(Player currentPlayer,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> loadedWeapon)
        Scan all the weapons of the current player to verify which effect of all weapons the players could pay.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer: - the current player
        loadedWeapon: - An ArrayList of loaded weapon
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of weapon in which the effects the player con't pay are set to null.

      • checkVisibility

        private java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> checkVisibility(Player currentPlayer,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> checkedWeapon)
        Scan all the effects of all weapons and check for each effect if there is at least one target the player could attack related to the typeVisibility of that effect.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer: - the current player
        checkedWeapon: - An ArrayList of weapon loaded without the effect the player can't pay
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of weapon without the effect that the player can't use because there isn't possible target

      • purgeUselessWeapons

        private java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> purgeUselessWeapons(java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> usableWeapon)
        Scan all the usable weapons in order to delete those weapon that has zero available effect
        Parameters:
        usableWeapon: - an ArrayList of usable weapon
